short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension loads the current options chain for your selected stock ticker (Ex. TSLA) from YH Finance API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can search for a specific ticker inside the extension or whenever you search a ticker in google. Additionally, there is a company summary using OpenAI's API.

This extension is very helpful for quick stock searches by providing relevant options information. (including charts)
